p.stage: Lights go on and Maya and Emily sit in small cafe, drinking coffee

u.s: Again, I am so glad that you came.
Of course, but you seemed to be off over the last few days, is therthere something that we need to talk about?

p.stage: Emily's eyes start to water and her voice gets shaky

u.s: I told you about how Isaac and Jory would come over for dinner, right?
Yes?
They came over to tell me that I am in the show, which are great news, but the rest of the evening was a horror show.
Emily, what happened?
I have never seen you like that.
So, from the beginning.
Isaac and I had an affaireaffair in London, which was a mistake, sure, but Amir was so distanced all the time and we fought every day.
Oh god, did Amir find out about that?
Yes, after Jory caught us kissing, I told him.
How did he take it?
Really bad.
Emily, everything will be fine, we will figure it out.
Thank you really, but that's not all.
He beated me up, he punched me, Amir punched me.
Oh shit, how are you?
I never expected Amir to do something like that!
I am fine, it wasn't that bad, I am just in shock and I don't know what to do.
Okay, first of all you need to calm down we will figure everything out.
Do you know if you want to press charges because if you do, sooner is better than later.
Do you have any idea why he blew up on you?
I don't know yet, he sent me letters apologizing and explaining everything.
What did he say?
He said, that he is so sorry, but just couldn't help himself.
He told me that everyday he felt unseen and not respected by me.
Wow, did you know that?
No, not at all, I am not racist.
I love Amir.
As an example he said that he felt so badly treated when I painted him.
I never wanted to hurt him.
I wanted to draw him like I see and how he really is, not how he looks from the outside.
I know it is hard to understand, but that's exactly what he meant.
You think that he is perceived a certain way, which is racist.
And I know you didn't mean to hurt him, but you can't look into his feelings.
Oh wow, I never looked at it in that way.
I always thought he would be happy, if I tell him that I don't see him like everyone else, but I just reminded him everyday of his ethnicity that he wanted to hide.
Yes, it's good that you understand that.
Also, I know you love the Islamic culture, their art, but for Amir it's not just the art that is part of that.
He knows how women are treated and has his own opinion on the Quran.
If you don't accept his believesbeliefs you disrespect him.
I never thought about any of that, thank you so much Maya!
No problem, but still that he beated you up is not okay and you have to decide, if you want to press charges.
Yeah, you're right.
I will have to think about that.
